title: Innovating Architectural Education in the Digital Age: Blended Learning and ICT Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic architectural terminology and structural understanding, smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: Professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields requiring practical interest in architectural education, conducting learning in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain architectural design processes in three or more stages using digital tools
Learners can actively contribute to online discussions and collaborative activities with an 80% or higher participation rate in blended learning environments
Learners can practice evaluating the stability and functionality of architectural structures using ICT-based simulation tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
